name: upvote-rss
description: Upvote RSS is a self-hosted platform that turns RSS feeds into a link-sharing site with voting and discussion, similar to a lightweight social news or Hacker News clone.
features: RSS aggregation: Import content from RSS feeds automatically for community discussion.
Voting system: Let users upvote and downvote content to surface the best articles.
Comment threads: Enable discussions on submitted links with threaded comments.
User accounts: Support user registration and authentication for voting and commenting.
Ranking algorithm: Rank content based on votes and time to show trending articles.
Feed management: Add and manage multiple RSS feeds as content sources.
Moderation tools: Moderate content and comments to maintain community quality.
Submission filtering: Filter and organize submissions by source, score, or date.
Social features: Follow users, save favorite articles, and build a personalized feed.
Mobile responsive: Access and participate from any device with a responsive design.
Privacy-focused: Host your own link aggregator without relying on third-party platforms.
Lightweight: Run efficiently with minimal resources for personal or small community use.
